entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
